Arg1: In an Oct. 19 review of "The Misanthrope" at Chicago's Goodman Theatre ("Revitalized Classics Take the Stage in Windy City," Leisure & Arts), the role of Celimene, played by Kim Cattrall, was mistakenly attributed to Christina Haag.
Arg2: Kim Cattrall had been cast as Celimene for the Goodman Theatre production since its opening night.
Label: Temporal
